00012 EditMapState::EditMapState() {
00013         this->background = IMG_Load(Setting::BACKGROUND_PLAY.c_str());
00014         if (!this->background) {
00015                 cerr << "Image could not load!";
00016         }
00017         this->map = new Map(26, 23);
00018         this->map->loadFile(Setting::DEFAULT_MAP);
00019 
00020         this->choice = 0;
00021         this->saveMap = false;
00022 }
00023 
00024 EditMapState::~EditMapState() {
00025         if (NULL != this->background) {
00026                 SDL_FreeSurface(this->background);
00027                 this->background = NULL;
00028         }
00029         delete map;
00030         map = NULL;
00031 }

00033 void EditMapState::draw(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00034         // Text color black
00035         SDL_Color blackColor = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00036         // Text color white
00037         SDL_Color whiteColor = { 255, 255, 255, 0 };
00038         // input color , red
00039         SDL_Color inputColor = { 159, 16, 16, 0 };
00040 
00041         SDL_Rect rect;
00042         rect.x = 0;
00043         rect.y = 0;
00044         SDL_BlitSurface(this->background, NULL, surface, &rect);
00045 
00046         // when save map
00047         if (this->saveMap) {
00048                 boxRGBA(surface, 200, 120, 540, 300, 150, 200, 150, 255);
00049                 Draw::text(surface, "Write map name", whiteColor, 200, 110, 50);
00050                 Draw::text(surface, this->mapName, inputColor, 210, 170, 30);
00051                 Draw::text(surface, "save map", whiteColor, 200, 200, 50);
00052                 return;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // At upper right
00056         Draw::text(surface, "Information", whiteColor, 825, 23, 32, 100);
00057         Draw::text(surface, "Your choice:", whiteColor, 825, 80, 20);
00058         rect.x = 930;
00059         rect.y = 80;
00060         if (this->choice == 0) {
00061                 SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[17], NULL, surface, &rect);
00062         } else {
00063                 SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[this->choice], NULL, surface, &rect);
00064         }
00065         Draw::text(surface, "Save Map", blackColor, 840, 150);
00066         Draw::text(surface, "Go to Startmenu", blackColor, 825, 220, 24);
00067         // At middle right
00068 
00069         Draw::text(surface, "Choose", blackColor, 830, 290, 50, 100);
00070         int marketTowerX = 800;
00071         int marketTowerY = 350;
00072         rect.x = marketTowerX;
00073         rect.y = marketTowerY;
00074         //road
00075         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[1], NULL, surface, &rect);
00076         //Defalt image
00077         rect.x = marketTowerX + 50;
00078         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[17], NULL, surface, &rect);
00079         //Startpoint
00080         rect.x = marketTowerX + 100;
00081         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[8], NULL, surface, &rect);
00082         //endpoint
00083         rect.x = marketTowerX + 150;
00084         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[9], NULL, surface, &rect);
00085 
00086         //box
00087         rect.x = marketTowerX;
00088         rect.y = marketTowerY + 40;
00089         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[11], NULL, surface, &rect);
00090         //Christmastree
00091         rect.x = marketTowerX + 50;
00092         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[6], NULL, surface, &rect);
00093         //Tree
00094         rect.x = marketTowerX + 100;
00095         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[10], NULL, surface, &rect);
00096         //grass
00097         rect.x = marketTowerX + 150;
00098         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[7], NULL, surface, &rect);
00099 
00100         //fire
00101         rect.x = marketTowerX;
00102         rect.y = marketTowerY + 80;
00103         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[12], NULL, surface, &rect);
00104         //water
00105         rect.x = marketTowerX + 50;
00106         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[13], NULL, surface, &rect);
00107         //stone
00108         rect.x = marketTowerX + 100;
00109         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[14], NULL, surface, &rect);
00110         //RIP stone
00111         rect.x = marketTowerX + 150;
00112         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[15], NULL, surface, &rect);
00113 
00114         //tree2
00115         rect.x = marketTowerX;
00116         rect.y = marketTowerY + 120;
00117         SDL_BlitSurface(this->map->tile[16], NULL, surface, &rect);
00118 
00119         this->map->draw(surface);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void EditMapState::keyPressed(SDLKey key) {
00123         if (this->saveMap) {
00124                 int ascii = this->event.key.keysym.unicode;
00125                 // Only allow A-Z,a-z letters and number 0-9
00126                 if ((ascii >= 48 && ascii <= 57) || (ascii >= 65 && ascii <= 90)
00127                                 || (ascii >= 97 && ascii <= 122) || SDLK_SPACE == key) {
00128                         this->mapName += (char) ascii;
00129                 } else if (SDLK_BACKSPACE == key) {
00130                         // Erase a letter in name
00131                         this->mapName = this->mapName.substr(0, mapName.length() - 1);
00132                 } else if (SDLK_RETURN == key) {
00133                         // Save name when press return
00134                         save();
00135                 }
00136         }
00137 
00138         if (SDLK_ESCAPE == key) {
00139                 this->done = true;
00140         }
00141 }

00143 void EditMapState::mouseMoved(const int button, const int mouseX,
00144                 const int mouseY) {
00145         if (button == 1) {
00146                 mousePressed(button, mouseX, mouseY);
00147         }
00148 }
00149 
00150 void EditMapState::mousePressed(const int button, const int mouseX,
00151                 const int mouseY) {
00152 
00153         if (!this->saveMap) {
00154                 if (this->map->mouseOver(mouseX, mouseY)) {
00155                         if (this->choice != 8 && this->choice != 9) {
00156                                 int mapPosition = this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00157                                 this->map->setTile(this->choice, this->map->tileToPosX(
00158                                                 mapPosition) + 1, this->map->tileToPosY(mapPosition) + 1);
00159 
00160                         } else if (this->choice == 8) {
00161                                 this->map->startPoint = this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00162                         } else if (this->choice == 9) {
00163                                 this->map->endPoint = this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166         }
00167 
00168         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 350, 30, 30)) {
00169                 this->choice = 1;
00170         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 850, 350, 30, 30)) {
00171                 this->choice = 0;
00172         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 900, 350, 30, 30)) {
00173                 this->choice = 8;
00174         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 950, 350, 30, 30)) {
00175                 this->choice = 9;
00176 
00177         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 390, 30, 30)) {
00178                 this->choice = 11;
00179         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 850, 390, 30, 30)) {
00180                 this->choice = 6;
00181         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 900, 390, 30, 30)) {
00182                 this->choice = 10;
00183         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 950, 390, 30, 30)) {
00184                 this->choice = 7;
00185 
00186         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 430, 30, 30)) {
00187                 this->choice = 12;
00188         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 850, 430, 30, 30)) {
00189                 this->choice = 13;
00190         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 900, 430, 30, 30)) {
00191                 this->choice = 14;
00192         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 950, 430, 30, 30)) {
00193                 this->choice = 15;
00194 
00195         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 470, 30, 30)) {
00196                 this->choice = 16;
00197         }
00198 
00199         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 840, 150, 150, 33)) {
00200                 this->saveMap = true;
00201         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 825, 220, 200, 26)) {
00202                 AbstractGameState* state = new IntroState();
00203                 this->state = state;
00204         }
00205 
00206         if (this->saveMap) {
00207                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 200, 200, 200, 50)) {
00208                         save();
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 }
00212 
00213 void EditMapState::save() {
00214         // Save the new map
00215         string map = Setting::MAP_DIR + this->mapName + ".txt";
00216         this->map->save(map);
00217         //return to IntroState
00218         AbstractGameState* state = new IntroState();
00219         this->state = state;
00220 }
